DC CODE ยง 7-761.09

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules as necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter.
Pursuant to Unit A of Chapter 3 of Title 2, the Mayor may execute contracts, grants, and other legally binding documents to implement the provisions of this chapter.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
